thread.title: LIVE: Panneerselvam camp hopes to receive 30 MLAs from Sasikala side today | Zee News
thread.title_full: LIVE: Panneerselvam camp hopes to receive 30 MLAs from Sasikala side today | Zee News

title: LIVE: Panneerselvam camp hopes to receive 30 MLAs from Sasikala side today | Zee News
text:
Comment 
Chennai: A day after Edappadi K Palaniswami met C Vidyasagar Rao with a list of legislators supporting him, the Tamil Nadu Governor is likely to invite the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam's (AIADMK) legislature party leader to form a government on Thursday. 
Palaniswami is part of AIADMK general secretary VK Sasikala camp. 
Notably, the Governor later met the rival party faction of acting Chief Minister O Panneerselvam. 
Earlier on Wednesday, AIADMK general secretary Sasikala, held guilty for corruption, returned to the Bengaluru jail. Latest Updates 09:41 AM 
A senior leader says the AIADMK camp led by Panneerselvam is hoping to receive a sizeable number of legislators today. Preferring anonymity, the leader tells news agency IANS that the Governor may not invite Public Works Minister Edappadi K Palaniswami to form the government in the state till everything seems to be clear. "With Deepa Jayakumar joining hands with Panneerselvam, the strength of our camp has increased manifold and there is no patch up moves," he adds. 09:39 AM 
As of now, neither O Panneerselvam nor Edappadi K Palaniswami has been called to form government, news agency ANI quotes Governor House sources as saying. 09:22 AM 
Earlier on Wednesday, AIADMK general secretary VK Sasikala, held guilty for corruption, returned to the Bengaluru jail . Sasikala, 59, was sent to a women's cell in the Central Jail soon after she reached Bengaluru in a convoy of cars from Chennai after her plea for more time to surrender was rejected by the Supreme Court.
